headline: Giants Say Goodbye to Manning, No. 1 in Their Hearts and Their Last No. 10
abstract: Former Giants players and coaches gathered as Manning, 39, formally announced his retirement from the N.F.L.
lead_paragraph: EAST RUTHERFORD, N.J. â€” John Mara, the co-owner of the Giants, choked back tears and his voice cracked as he recalled the last game attended by Wellington Mara, his father and the longtime patriarch of the Giants.
